original_title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Darjeeling Himalayan Toy Train
overview: The finest way to travel from Siliguri to Darjeeling is by the Darjeeling Himalaya Toy Train. The surroundings of Siliguri are well worth a visit & just a few kilometers away is Kali Mandir & Coronation Bridge an old but impressive structure that was designed & built by the British in 1930. Thank you the Darjeeling Himalayan Toy Train for a unique journey & one which will not easily be forgotten
title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Darjeeling Himalayan Toy Train
